Quote.Author: Young Jeezy
Quote.QuoteValue: It's not the average people that come to my show

Quote.Author: Young Jeezy
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a motivational speaker

Quote.Author: Young Jeezy
Quote.QuoteValue: I never ever paid attention to any election

Quote.Author: Young Jeezy
Quote.QuoteValue: I could sit right here and have a 15-minute conversation with somebody and change their whole life

Quote.Author: Young Thug
Quote.QuoteValue: I hope to be like Bill Gates, bro. With all the money in the world

Quote.Author: Young Thug
Quote.QuoteValue: It's dangerous to be anybody popular

Quote.Author: Young Thug
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't do my own Instagram

Quote.Author: Young Thug
Quote.QuoteValue: I only listen to Lil Wayne

Quote.Author: Young Thug
Quote.QuoteValue: When it comes to swag, there's no gender involved

Quote.Author: Young Thug
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was in high school, I had a gambling problem

Quote.Author: Young Thug
Quote.QuoteValue: Ninety percent of my clothes are women's

Quote.Author: Young Thug
Quote.QuoteValue: My dad wouldn't buy me tight pants. I had to get my own money to buy them

Quote.Author: Young Thug
Quote.QuoteValue: I can't remember 16 bars. Unless you write it, you can't. I just do it bar for bar

Quote.Author: Young Thug
Quote.QuoteValue: I want every Grammy

Quote.Author: Youssou N'Dour
Quote.QuoteValue: When the slaves left Africa, they left us this music. They left us blues

Quote.Author: Youssou N'Dour
Quote.QuoteValue: Travel teaches as much as books

Quote.Author: Youssou N'Dour
Quote.QuoteValue: I love meeting interesting people and doing things with them

Quote.Author: Youssou N'Dour
Quote.QuoteValue: Islam is a peaceful religion

Quote.Author: Youssou N'Dour
Quote.QuoteValue: Islam has been badly used by a certain ideology

Quote.Author: Youssou N'Dour
Quote.QuoteValue: I respect music, I do. I love it

Quote.Author: Youssou N'Dour
Quote.QuoteValue: I have studied at the school of the world

Quote.Author: Youssou N'Dour
Quote.QuoteValue: Politics is politics; art is art. If you play a political role, you have to stop being an artist

Quote.Author: Youssou N'Dour
Quote.QuoteValue: In politics, sometimes you have to lie, or you make a promise that you cannot keep

Quote.Author: Youssou N'Dour
Quote.QuoteValue: My music is like a spinning ball. It can turn in one direction, and then it comes back to origins

Quote.Author: Yuna
Quote.QuoteValue: My label understands that I am really attached to Malaysia, that I come home a lot

Quote.Author: Yuna
Quote.QuoteValue: Embrace the color of your skin and your own beauty

Quote.Author: Yuna
Quote.QuoteValue: To have a sense of style, it shows you know yourself. People like that

Quote.Author: Yuna
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a lot of friends who do EDM music; they had to tell me what a 'drop' was

Quote.Author: Yuna
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my headscarf. I wear my head wrap every day with my hoop earrings

Quote.Author: Yuna
Quote.QuoteValue: I always put on M.A.C. Prep and Primer before anything

Quote.Author: Yuna
Quote.QuoteValue: I know how to wrap my turban a little better now. In the beginning, it was a little weird

Quote.Author: Yuna
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a Muslim. I don't try to hide it. I'm also a girl who loves music

Quote.Author: Yuna
Quote.QuoteValue: I like that I don't have to conform to the normal women-in-music-selling-sex-appeal thing

Quote.Author: Yuna
Quote.QuoteValue: I want girls to know that equality exists in this world. You can do anything you want

Quote.Author: Yuri Milner
Quote.QuoteValue: I am not an oligarch. I am a servant and I try to align my interests and those of my investors

Quote.Author: Yuri Milner
Quote.QuoteValue: I have invested in four social networks. More than any other

Quote.Author: Yuri Milner
Quote.QuoteValue: I have invested in four social networks. More than any other. But that's in Russia and Poland

Quote.Author: Yuri Milner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm just focused on exploring new opportunities

Quote.Author: Yuri Milner
Quote.QuoteValue: My background is in theoretical physics, and it's something very close to my heart

Quote.Author: Yuri Milner
Quote.QuoteValue: There is huge demand for artificial intelligence technologies

Quote.Author: Yuri Milner
Quote.QuoteValue: You have to travel globally today to know what's going on and maintain an edge

Quote.Author: Yuri Milner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm trying to learn from various corners of the world

Quote.Author: Yuri Milner
Quote.QuoteValue: Facebook didn't know how successful Zynga would be

Quote.Author: Yuri Milner
Quote.QuoteValue: Google never knew how successful key words would be

Quote.Author: Yves Behar
Quote.QuoteValue: Design is a tool that either allows us to create new markets or disrupt existing ones

Quote.Author: Yves Behar
Quote.QuoteValue: Design needs a new relationship with the world, one that is more focused on our planet's needs

Quote.Author: Yves Behar
Quote.QuoteValue: My mantra is: 'Good design accelerates the adoption of new ideas.'

Quote.Author: Yves Behar
Quote.QuoteValue: Consumers want products that tell stories, have magic, and inspire

Quote.Author: Yves Behar
Quote.QuoteValue: If you don't love something, it's not functional, in my opinion

Quote.Author: Yves Behar
Quote.QuoteValue: Our principal role as designers is to accelerate new ideas and the adoption of new ideas

Quote.Author: Yves Behar
Quote.QuoteValue: I never felt truly at home in Switzerland

Quote.Author: Yves Behar
Quote.QuoteValue: Advertising is the price companies pay for being unoriginal

Quote.Author: Yves Behar
Quote.QuoteValue: Steve Jobs changed my life. He also changed the life of every designer

Quote.Author: Yves Behar
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea of designing something that is like something else is incredibly uninteresting and boring

Quote.Author: Yves Saint Laurent
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashions fade, style is eternal

Quote.Author: Yves Saint Laurent
Quote.QuoteValue: We must never confuse elegance with snobbery

Quote.Author: Yves Saint Laurent
Quote.QuoteValue: Isn't elegance forgetting what one is wearing?

Quote.Author: Yves Saint Laurent
Quote.QuoteValue: It pains me physically to see a woman victimized, rendered pathetic, by fashion

Quote.Author: Yves Saint Laurent
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm so secluded. Very alone

Quote.Author: Yves Saint Laurent
Quote.QuoteValue: I adore America. It's an extraordinary country. A new country

Quote.Author: Yves Saint Laurent
Quote.QuoteValue: Dressing is a way of life

Quote.Author: Yves Saint Laurent
Quote.QuoteValue: I am no longer concerned with sensation and innovation, but with the perfection of my style

Quote.Author: Yves Saint Laurent
Quote.QuoteValue: A good model can advance fashion by ten years

Quote.Author: Yves Saint Laurent
Quote.QuoteValue: Over the years I have learned that what is important in a dress is the woman who is wearing it

Quote.Author: Yvonne Strahovski
Quote.QuoteValue: I feel lucky that I got to work with some of the big legends in town

Quote.Author: Yvonne Strahovski
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always been a very outdoors sort of girl. I'm more a tomboy than a girly girl

Quote.Author: Yvonne Strahovski
Quote.QuoteValue: I think a man is a man, and a man has a hairy chest, so let that be!

Quote.Author: Yvonne Strahovski
Quote.QuoteValue: If I can't do high kicks or dance in it, then I won't wear it

Quote.Author: Yvonne Strahovski
Quote.QuoteValue: You definitely cannot please everyone at all

Quote.Author: Yvonne Strahovski
Quote.QuoteValue: I just love the culture of Melbourne

Quote.Author: Yvonne Strahovski
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm pretty gross. When I talk I can be gross and crude

Quote.Author: Yvonne Strahovski
Quote.QuoteValue: I was a tomboy and didn't pay too much attention to my clothes

Quote.Author: Yvonne Strahovski
Quote.QuoteValue: I guess I am a bit of a traditionalist

Quote.Author: Yvonne Strahovski
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't know if this classifies as a video game, but I have a terrible obsession with Angry Birds

Quote.Author: Zac Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: To me, country music has always been the home for a great song

Quote.Author: Zac Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Good music makes you feel something

Quote.Author: Zac Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: When I'm home, I'm Daddy, and everything is completely normal

Quote.Author: Zac Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: If I hear one more tailgate in the moonlight, Daisy Dukes song, I wanna throw up

Quote.Author: Zac Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: We can help show data on how much the kids can improve when their home life changes a little bit

Quote.Author: Zac Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm from Georgia, and everybody gathers around food in the South

Quote.Author: Zac Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: 'A Pirate Looks at 40,' we had to do that song. I've been covering that forever

Quote.Author: Zac Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: We always push the boundaries on the styles we put on a record

Quote.Author: Zac Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to get better every year

Quote.Author: Zac Brown
Quote.QuoteValue: Every record we do, we do one song we didn't write

Quote.Author: Zac Efron
Quote.QuoteValue: I've grown up a lot, I'm on my own, and I've learned some valuable life lessons

Quote.Author: Zac Efron
Quote.QuoteValue: Every day is a new experience and I take it as it comes

Quote.Author: Zac Efron
Quote.QuoteValue: If I splurge on anything, it's cologne. I love smelling good

Quote.Author: Zac Efron
Quote.QuoteValue: I want to be a well-rounded, versatile performer

Quote.Author: Zac Efron
Quote.QuoteValue: I'll never try to put on a fake image. I'm just Zac

Quote.Author: Zac Efron
Quote.QuoteValue: High School Musical has been a blessing and a gift

Quote.Author: Zac Efron
Quote.QuoteValue: Working out is my biggest hobby. It's my Zen hour. I just zone out

Quote.Author: Zac Efron
Quote.QuoteValue: I bought an electric scooter in sixth grade. Bankrupted me

Quote.Author: Zac Efron
Quote.QuoteValue: A girl can tell I like her when I blush or start telling bad jokes

Quote.Author: Zac Efron
Quote.QuoteValue: Great advice comes from people that have been around a lot longer than you

Quote.Author: Zac Posen
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is killing women's body image of themselves

Quote.Author: Zac Posen
Quote.QuoteValue: Listen, I'm not a rich kid. I'm a cultured kid; I'm very rich in culture

Quote.Author: Zac Posen
Quote.QuoteValue: So many people are following fashion now. It's become fashion-tainment

Quote.Author: Zac Posen
Quote.QuoteValue: Taking sartorial risks and not following other people is what makes you stand out

Quote.Author: Zac Posen
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm quite a tuxedo junkie, I collect them all year round

Quote.Author: Zac Posen
Quote.QuoteValue: Food is everything. Food, friends, family: Those are the most important things in life

Quote.Author: Zac Posen
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a compulsive and concise shopper

Quote.Author: Zac Posen
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't believe in one ideal beauty

Quote.Author: Zac Posen
Quote.QuoteValue: People who devote themselves to a life of style are admirable

Quote.Author: Zac Posen
Quote.QuoteValue: I am totally unattached to material items

Quote.Author: Zach Anner
Quote.QuoteValue: Spontaneity is what travel is all about

Quote.Author: Zach Anner
Quote.QuoteValue: My parents instilled in me a sense of self that I was more than just a diagnosis or a condition

Quote.Author: Zach Anner
Quote.QuoteValue: When I get real excited, my muscles go into spasm, so they just shake

Quote.Author: Zach Anner
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd wanted to be famous for as long as I could remember

Quote.Author: Zach Anner
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was five years old, I auditioned for the role of 'Tiny Tim in A Christmas Carol.'

Quote.Author: Zach Anner
Quote.QuoteValue: The Internet is crazy, and I love it!

Quote.Author: Zach Anner
Quote.QuoteValue: New Yorkers - the people are so honest. If you're sucking on stage, they'll let you know

Quote.Author: Zach Anner
Quote.QuoteValue: This country is pretty amazing

Quote.Author: Zach Anner
Quote.QuoteValue: Most people are really dedicated to doing good things

Quote.Author: Zach Anner
Quote.QuoteValue: Even the most embarrassing mishap can be spun into comedic gold

Quote.Author: Zach Braff
Quote.QuoteValue: I always encourage over-tipping if you can afford it because... share the wealth

Quote.Author: Zach Braff
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm putting myself out there in a way I don't know if I ever have before

Quote.Author: Zach Braff
Quote.QuoteValue: I really like just super dry comedy

Quote.Author: Zach Braff
Quote.QuoteValue: I have a great relationship with my parents. I have not been on lithium

Quote.Author: Zach Braff
Quote.QuoteValue: I think I suffer from some mild depression

Quote.Author: Zach Braff
Quote.QuoteValue: The best way to travel abroad is to live with the locals

Quote.Author: Zach Braff
Quote.QuoteValue: That image is a couple different people's homes that I knew growing up

Quote.Author: Zach Braff
Quote.QuoteValue: Gay men in L.A. are all a bunch of tens looking for an eleven

Quote.Author: Zach Braff
Quote.QuoteValue: Everyone has a warped vision of Hollywood and what success in Hollywood is like

Quote.Author: Zach Braff
Quote.QuoteValue: I love 'Scrubs.' It's the best day job in the world

Quote.Author: Zach Galifianakis
Quote.QuoteValue: I am going to be the next Ryan Gosling

Quote.Author: Zach Galifianakis
Quote.QuoteValue: Inappropriateness is funny to me. Rudeness is hilarious

Quote.Author: Zach Galifianakis
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm Greek. My body produces feta cheese

Quote.Author: Zach Galifianakis
Quote.QuoteValue: That show, 'The Amazing Race' - is that about white people?

Quote.Author: Zach Galifianakis
Quote.QuoteValue: Privacy is big for me. To do interviews even, I have a very love/hate with it

Quote.Author: Zach Galifianakis
Quote.QuoteValue: My real last name is Galifianakisburg

Quote.Author: Zach Galifianakis
Quote.QuoteValue: My forte is awkwardness

Quote.Author: Zach Galifianakis
Quote.QuoteValue: American society loves to prop people up and then take them down

Quote.Author: Zach Galifianakis
Quote.QuoteValue: I would have changed my last name if being famous were my goal

Quote.Author: Zach Galifianakis
Quote.QuoteValue: Fat jokes to me are always, always hilarious, as long as they're done towards yourself

Quote.Author: Zadie Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The library was the place I went to find out what there was to know. It was absolutely essential

Quote.Author: Zadie Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: There is no bigger crime, in the English comic novel, than thinking you are right

Quote.Author: Zadie Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Don't confuse honours with achievement

Quote.Author: Zadie Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Your mid-thirties is a good time because you know a fair amount, you have some self-control

Quote.Author: Zadie Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The lack of alternatives to an illegal action does not legitimise that action

Quote.Author: Zadie Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm always a bit suspicious of writers who have the gift of the gab

Quote.Author: Zadie Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: Like all readers, I want my limits to be drawn by my own sensibilities, not by my melanin count

Quote.Author: Zadie Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: I often worry that my idea of personhood is nostalgic, irrational, inaccurate

Quote.Author: Zadie Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: The idea that motherhood is inherently somehow a threat to creativity is just absurd

Quote.Author: Zadie Smith
Quote.QuoteValue: When I think of the books I love, there's always a little laughter in the dark

Quote.Author: Zaha Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: What's nice about concrete is that it looks unfinished

Quote.Author: Zaha Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: In hospital, people should be able to have time to themselves

Quote.Author: Zaha Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: I have always appreciated those who dare to experiment with materials and proportions

Quote.Author: Zaha Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: I always thought I was powerful, since I was a kid

Quote.Author: Zaha Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: I am sure that as a woman I can do a very good skyscraper

Quote.Author: Zaha Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: I will never give myself the luxury of thinking, 'I've made it.'

Quote.Author: Zaha Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: Like men, women have to be diligent and work hard

Quote.Author: Zaha Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: Would they call me a diva if I were a guy?

Quote.Author: Zaha Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: My friendships are very important to me

Quote.Author: Zaha Hadid
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm a pushover. I make allowances for people if I like them

Quote.Author: Zakk Wylde
Quote.QuoteValue: There's only one Sabbath guitarist and he is the architect for everything, Tony Iommi

Quote.Author: Zakk Wylde
Quote.QuoteValue: The way I look at it you can always get better

Quote.Author: Zakk Wylde
Quote.QuoteValue: The tours are campaigns

Quote.Author: Zakk Wylde
Quote.QuoteValue: It isn't a band. It's bigger than a band. It's a lifestyle

Quote.Author: Zakk Wylde
Quote.QuoteValue: Since day one my thing has always been to play the music

Quote.Author: Zakk Wylde
Quote.QuoteValue: You're never going to learn everything

Quote.Author: Zakk Wylde
Quote.QuoteValue: You never toot your own horn

Quote.Author: Zakk Wylde
Quote.QuoteValue: We just done doing The Blessed Hellride tour and Ozzfest

Quote.Author: Zakk Wylde
Quote.QuoteValue: Ozzy has dyslexia

Quote.Author: Zakk Wylde
Quote.QuoteValue: On the tour we get a case of beer on the bus every day from Ozzfest

Quote.Author: Zane Grey
Quote.QuoteValue: Love grows more tremendously full, swift, poignant, as the years multiply

Quote.Author: Zane Grey
Quote.QuoteValue: I am full of fire and passion. I am not ready yet for great concentration and passion

Quote.Author: Zane Grey
Quote.QuoteValue: What is writing but an expression of my own life?

Quote.Author: Zane Grey
Quote.QuoteValue: I am tired. My arm aches. My head boils. My feet are cold. But I am not aware of any weakness

Quote.Author: Zane Grey
Quote.QuoteValue: I arise full of eagerness and energy, knowing well what achievement lies ahead of me

Quote.Author: Zane Grey
Quote.QuoteValue: I will see this game of life out to its bitter end

Quote.Author: Zane Grey
Quote.QuoteValue: Men may rise on stepping stones of their dead selves to higher things

Quote.Author: Zane Grey
Quote.QuoteValue: I need this wild life, this freedom

Quote.Author: Zane Grey
Quote.QuoteValue: Today I began the novel that I determined to be great

Quote.Author: Zane Grey
Quote.QuoteValue: I can write best in the silence and solitude of the night, when everyone has retired

Quote.Author: Zara Larsson
Quote.QuoteValue: We're here for a little, little bit of time, and I just wanna make the most out of it

Quote.Author: Zara Larsson
Quote.QuoteValue: I like to spend as much time with my friends and family as possible

Quote.Author: Zara Larsson
Quote.QuoteValue: It really is a dream coming true, being on Billboard

Quote.Author: Zara Larsson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think life is a chain of events

Quote.Author: Zara Larsson
Quote.QuoteValue: When I was about nine or 10, I was on a few random talent shows in shopping malls

Quote.Author: Zara Larsson
Quote.QuoteValue: I love eyebrows, so brow pencils and brow shadow are really important to me

Quote.Author: Zara Larsson
Quote.QuoteValue: I think whatever you love the most is where you should spend your money

Quote.Author: Zara Larsson
Quote.QuoteValue: If you love attention and have a pretty decent voice, that's a pretty good combination

Quote.Author: Zara Larsson
Quote.QuoteValue: I've always known that singing was some sort of calling for me. It comes naturally

Quote.Author: Zara Larsson
Quote.QuoteValue: History is important but... I just wanna sing Beyonce songs all day long in front of a mirror

Quote.Author: Zara Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not a princess anyway so I find that quite weird to be labelled as one

Quote.Author: Zara Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: I love the sport and being competitive

Quote.Author: Zara Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: Unfortunately in sport it's either good or bad. You've got to take the highs and the lows

Quote.Author: Zara Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: I hate having my picture taken

Quote.Author: Zara Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: The senior members of the royal family work very hard and I don't think people quite realise that

Quote.Author: Zara Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm an affectionate person

Quote.Author: Zara Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: You cannot make horses 'safe.'

Quote.Author: Zara Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: Taking part in an Olympics on home ground is something you dream about

Quote.Author: Zara Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: I don't think about the media

Quote.Author: Zara Phillips
Quote.QuoteValue: I'd love to have kids, but not at the moment

Quote.Author: Zayn Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: Everything is very black and white for me. I don't really like playing mind games

Quote.Author: Zayn Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I am a bit of a bad boy. I have tattoos and I mess around. That's part of my image, so it's cool

Quote.Author: Zayn Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I like the term 'misunderstood.' But I am a bit of a bad boy

Quote.Author: Zayn Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: When people are putting pressure on me I just completely ignore it

Quote.Author: Zayn Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I love samosas filled with mincemeat. My mum makes really great ones

Quote.Author: Zayn Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I believe that your religion should be between you and whoever your belief is in

Quote.Author: Zayn Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I just love comic books. I've always loved comic book art, and I just think it's amazing

Quote.Author: Zayn Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I've got three sisters, five aunties, and my mom. It must have had an influence on me growing up

Quote.Author: Zayn Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I think people I'm close to find it absolutely crazy that I'm famous

Quote.Author: Zayn Malik
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not one to get involved with what anyone says about me

Quote.Author: Zbigniew Brzezinski
Quote.QuoteValue: We now have the opportunity of giving to the USSR its Vietnam war

Quote.Author: Zbigniew Brzezinski
Quote.QuoteValue: We need to ask who is the enemy, and the enemies are terrorists

Quote.Author: Zbigniew Brzezinski
Quote.QuoteValue: We cannot have that relationship if we only dictate or threaten and condemn those who disagree

Quote.Author: Zbigniew Brzezinski
Quote.QuoteValue: To increase the zone of peace is to build the inner core of a stable international zone

Quote.Author: Zbigniew Brzezinski
Quote.QuoteValue: In Iraq we must succeed. Failure is not an option

Quote.Author: Zbigniew Brzezinski
Quote.QuoteValue: American power worldwide is at its historic zenith

Quote.Author: Zbigniew Brzezinski
Quote.QuoteValue: Eurasia is home to most of the world's politically assertive and dynamic states

Quote.Author: Zbigniew Brzezinski
Quote.QuoteValue: The 'war on terror' has created a culture of fear in America

Quote.Author: Zbigniew Brzezinski
Quote.QuoteValue: There's no point considering something which is very unrealistic

Quote.Author: Zbigniew Brzezinski
Quote.QuoteValue: The legitimacy of the leadership depends on what that country thinks of its leaders

Quote.Author: Zebulon Pike
Quote.QuoteValue: You have already disarmed my men without my knowledge, are their arms to be returned or not?

Quote.Author: Zebulon Pike
Quote.QuoteValue: Your former Fathers the Spaniards have now no further Authority over you

Quote.Author: Zebulon Pike
Quote.QuoteValue: The toute ensemble was such as to make polished society blush, when compared with these savages

Quote.Author: Zebulon Pike
Quote.QuoteValue: Strict justice would demand total confiscation of your property, personal imprisonment and fines

Quote.Author: Zebulon Pike
Quote.QuoteValue: Smoke the pipe of peace, bury the tomahawk, and become one nation

Quote.Author: Zebulon Pike
Quote.QuoteValue: On no further occasion present a flag or medal to an Indian

Quote.Author: Zebulon Pike
Quote.QuoteValue: May Heaven be propitious, and smile on the cause of my country

Quote.Author: Zebulon Pike
Quote.QuoteValue: In my proper character, I am an officer of the United States Army

Quote.Author: Zebulon Pike
Quote.QuoteValue: I was informed... that some... were dreaming and wished to return

Quote.Author: Zebulon Pike
Quote.QuoteValue: If we go to Chihuahua we must be considered as prisoners of war?

Quote.Author: Zendaya
Quote.QuoteValue: I was born an auntie. I have an older niece and nephew and many younger nieces and nephews

Quote.Author: Zendaya
Quote.QuoteValue: If there's any definition to being perfect, you're perfect at being yourself

Quote.Author: Zendaya
Quote.QuoteValue: As you grow older, your music begins to mature and grow older along with you

Quote.Author: Zendaya
Quote.QuoteValue: Let's practice motivation and love, not discrimination and hate

Quote.Author: Zendaya
Quote.QuoteValue: Fashion is a great thing, it's a way to express who you are

Quote.Author: Zendaya
Quote.QuoteValue: One of my dreams is to walk down the runway during Fashion Week!

Quote.Author: Zendaya
Quote.QuoteValue: There are so many great things in life; why dwell on negativity?

Quote.Author: Zendaya
Quote.QuoteValue: I love my fashion, so I gotta have my outfits

Quote.Author: Zendaya
Quote.QuoteValue: People always want to doubt you

Quote.Author: Zendaya
Quote.QuoteValue: Sticking with your vision and what you believe in is so, so important

Quote.Author: Zhang Yimou
Quote.QuoteValue: Piracy has destroyed the domestic market

Quote.Author: Zhang Yimou
Quote.QuoteValue: For over ten years I always had, but I don't speak English

Quote.Author: Zhang Yimou
Quote.QuoteValue: I must stick with Chinese language films

Quote.Author: Zhang Yimou
Quote.QuoteValue: To do art, one thing should always remember - subjects of people in misery have deep meanings

Quote.Author: Zhang Yimou
Quote.QuoteValue: Only people have been through that miserable time will recall the pass from their deep memory

Quote.Author: Zhang Yimou
Quote.QuoteValue: To survive is to win

Quote.Author: Zhang Yimou
Quote.QuoteValue: I'm not Ang Lee who knows so much about western market and the taste of western audiences

Quote.Author: Zhang Yimou
Quote.QuoteValue: Wuxia is a fantasy world exists in everyone's mind

Quote.Author: Zhang Yimou
Quote.QuoteValue: This is my first wuxia movie and I must consider this before trying to make something with my own

Quote.Author: Zhang Yimou
Quote.QuoteValue: HERO is a combination of my personal feeling and the commercialism

Quote.Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote.QuoteValue: Positive thinking will let you do everything better than negative thinking will

Quote.Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote.QuoteValue: Your attitude, not your aptitude, will determine your altitude

Quote.Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote.QuoteValue: What you get by achieving your goals is not as important as what you become by achieving your goals

Quote.Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote.QuoteValue: If people like you, they'll listen to you, but if they trust you, they'll do business with you

Quote.Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote.QuoteValue: Try to look at your weakness and convert it into your strength. That's success

Quote.Author: Zig Ziglar
Quote.QuoteValue: You were born to win, but to be a winner, you must plan to win, prepare to win, and expect to win
